allow: Bash(powershell -Command "& ''C:\\Users\\fabia\\arena\\tools\\AssemblyAnalyzer\\AssemblyAnalyzer.exe'' ''C:\\Program Files\\Wizards of the Coast\\MTGA\\MTGA_Data\\Managed\\Core.dll'' 2>&1 | Select-String -Pattern ''reward|chest|prize|claim|grant'' -CaseSensitive:$false | Select-Object -First 30")

Bash(powershell -Command "$logs = Get-ChildItem ''C:\\Program Files\\Wizards of the Coast\\MTGA\\MelonLoader\\Logs''; foreach \($log in $logs\) { $found = Select-String -Path $log.FullName -Pattern ''attack|Attack'' -Quiet; if \($found\) { Write-Host $log.Name } }")
Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem ''C:\\Program Files\\Wizards of the Coast\\MTGA\\MelonLoader\\Logs\\*.log'' | Select-String -Pattern ''Attack'' | Select-Object -First 20 Path, Line")

Bash(powershell -Command "Select-String -Path ''C:\\Program Files\\Wizards of the Coast\\MTGA\\MelonLoader\\Latest.log'' -Pattern ''UXEventUpdatePhase|PhaseChange|Declare|Main phase|Combat|End step'' -Context 0,0")

Bash(powershell -Command "Select-String -Path ''C:\\Program Files\\Wizards of the Coast\\MTGA\\MelonLoader\\Logs\\26-1-9_20-58-6.log'' -Pattern ''PLAYING CARD|Card play|ZoneTransfer|Step 1|Step 2|Step 3'' -Context 0,1")

Bash(powershell -Command "Select-String -Path ''C:\\Program Files\\Wizards of the Coast\\MTGA\\MelonLoader\\Logs\\26-1-9_20-48-36.log'' -Pattern ''PLAYING CARD|Card play|ZoneTransfer|Activating:'' -Context 0,1")

Bash(powershell -Command "Get-ChildItem ''C:\\Program Files\\Wizards of the Coast\\MTGA\\MelonLoader\\Logs'' | Sort-Object LastWriteTime -Descending | ForEach-Object { $hasPlay = Select-String -Path $_FullName -Pattern ''ZoneTransfer: Played'' -Quiet; if \($hasPlay\) { Write-Host $_Name } }")
Bash(powershell -Command "Select-String -Path ''C:\\Program Files\\Wizards of the Coast\\MTGA\\MelonLoader\\Logs\\*.log'' -Pattern ''ZoneTransfer: Played'' | Select-Object -First 10")
Bash(powershell -Command "Select-String -Path ''C:\\Program Files\\Wizards of the Coast\\MTGA\\MelonLoader\\Logs\\*.log'' -Pattern ''Drew|played|cast'' | Select-Object -First 20")

Bash(powershell -Command "Select-String -Path ''C:\\Program Files\\Wizards of the Coast\\MTGA\\MelonLoader\\Logs\\26-1-9*.log'' -Pattern ''Clicking at position|PLAYING CARD|screen center|Step 3'' -Context 0,2")
Bash(powershell -Command "Select-String -Path ''C:\\Program Files\\Wizards of the Coast\\MTGA\\MelonLoader\\Logs\\*.log'' -Pattern ''Clicking at position'' | Select-Object -First 20")
